item.title: Seth Lindgren
item.description: Seth is a St. Thomas Electrical Engineering student with an interest in physics. In the research lab, he has developed a new time-of-flight experimental system which we are using to explore unconventional applications of timing light. In the summer of 2024, Seth was supported by an Undergraduate Research Opportunities Program young scholar’s grant.

item.title: Thomas Gagnon
item.description: Thomas is a St. Thomas Computer Engineering student who is pursuing a double major in physics. In the research lab, he has been implementing image processing algorithms onto Opal Kelly FPGAs.

item.title: Jonathan Millam
item.description: Jon is a St. Thomas Computer Engineering student. In the research lab, Jon has investigated material classfication using time-of-flight transients. Jon loves to code and is the lab PyTorch machine learning expert.
